original_text:
Banana King
Questa slot di casa World Match ci ritroviamo catapultata in una rigogliosa foresta popolata da simpatici scimpanzé golosi di banane. E come ogni volta, quando parliamo di questo sviluppatore sappiamo che ci troveremo di fronte a una slot impeccabile da tutti i punti di vista. Prima di avventurarci nella descrizione del funzionamento di questo gioco, spendiamo due parole sulla grafica, su cui è stato fatto un ottimo lavoro.
La griglia di gioco è una serie di rami intrecciati, con la foresta rigogliosa sullo sfondo. Di solito nelle altre slot World Match i tasti si trovano sulla sinistra, stavolta invece sono nella parte bassa della schermata. Linee, Livello della puntata, Start, Puntata massima e Autoplay sono i pulsanti a disposizione. Più in basso ci sono le statistiche delle puntate, vincite e costo di ogni spin e linee attive.
Caratteristiche di Banana King
La griglia ha 5 rulli e 3 righe, con linee selezionabili per step: possiamo decidere di impostare 1, 5, 10, 15 o 25 linee di pagamento. Per quel che riguarda la puntata, si parte da un minimo di 0,01 € per linea, comunque variabile a nostro piacimento sin o a un massimo di 2 €. Si vince associando simboli adiacenti a partire dal rullo di sinistra verso destra su una linea attiva.
Banana King dà la possibilità di selezionare tra i 5 e i 1.000 giri automatici e di impostare con un unico tasto la scommessa massima (30 €).
Il valore RTP è del 92,81%.
Simboli e funzionalità
I simboli del gioco base sono 10. Partendo da quelli dal valore più basso, partiamo con quelli che servono a formare una scala reale, dal 9 all’asso. A seguire troviamo le ciliegie, le banane, la corona di foglie e infine lo scimpanzé.
Il mango è il nostro simbolo Wild, e grazie alla sua funzione di Jolly sostituisce tutti i simboli eccetto quelli speciali.
La scritta Free Spins ci regala giri gratuiti, 15 se atterrano tre simboli, 30 con quattro simboli e ben 60 con cinque simboli. Durante i Free Spins conquistarne altri.
Lo scimpanzé con la scritta Bonus dà il via alla funzione speciale. La griglia scompare e appaiono delle file di banane. Noi dovremo cliccare su alcune banane e scoprire il premio corrispondente. Il gioco termina quando sullo schermo appare la scritta Collect.

raw_translation.response:
Banana King
In this slot game produced by World Match, we find ourselves immersed in a lush forest inhabited by lively and greedy chimpanzees. As always with this developer, we know we can expect an impeccable slot game from every point of view. Before delving into the mechanics of the game, let's take a moment to appreciate the excellent work done on the graphics.
The game grid consists of interwoven branches, with the lush forest in the background. Unlike other World Match slots where the buttons are on the left, this time they are located at the bottom of the screen. Available buttons include Lines, Bet Level, Start, Max Bet, and Autoplay. Further down, you can view statistics on bets, wins, and the cost of each spin and active lines.
Features of Banana King
The grid has 5 reels and 3 rows, with selectable paylines: you can choose to set 1, 5, 10, 15, or 25 paylines. The minimum bet is 0.01 € per line, but you can adjust it to your liking up to a maximum of 2 €. Wins are earned by aligning adjacent symbols from left to right on an active payline.
Banana King lets you choose between 5 and 1,000 automatic spins and set the maximum bet (30 €) with a single button press.
The RTP value is 92.81%.
Symbols and features
There are 10 base game symbols, ranging from the lowest value represented by the cards 9 to Ace in royal flush format. Next in line: cherries, bananas, leaf crowns, and finally the chimpanzee.
The mango is our Wild symbol and, thanks to its function as a substitute, replaces all symbols except special ones.
The Free Spins symbol entitles us to free spins, with 15 for landing three symbols, 30 for four, and 60 for five. During Free Spins, it is possible to win even more spins.
The chimpanzee with the Bonus symbol triggers the special feature. The grid disappears, and rows of bananas appear. We need to click on some bananas to uncover their corresponding prize. The game ends when the Collect symbol appears on the screen.

The RTP value is 92.81%.

raw_translation.response:
Banana King

In this slot game from World Match, we find ourselves in a lush forest inhabited by friendly banana-loving chimpanzees. As always, when we're talking about this developer, we know we'll be facing a flawless slot from every point of view. Before venturing into the description of how this game works, let's spend a few words on the graphics, which have been excellently crafted.

The game grid consists of a series of intertwined branches, with the lush forest in the background. Usually, in other World Match slots, the buttons are located on the left, but this time they are at the bottom of the screen. The buttons available are Lines, Bet Level, Start, Max Bet, and Autoplay. Lower down, there are the betting statistics, winnings, and the cost of each spin and active lines.

Features of Banana King

The grid features 5 reels and 3 rows, with selectable lines in steps: we can choose to set 1, 5, 10, 15, or even 25 pay lines. As for the bet, it starts from a minimum of €0.01 per line, but it can be adjusted to our liking up to a maximum of €2. We win by matching adjacent symbols starting from the leftmost reel to the right on an active line.

Banana King offers the possibility to select between 5 and 1,000 automatic spins and to set the maximum bet (€30) with a single button press.

The RTP value is 92.81%.

Symbols and functionalities

The game's basic symbols are 10. Starting from the lowest value, we begin with those used to form a royal flush, from 9 to Ace. Next up, we have cherries, bananas, a leaf crown, and finally, the chimpanzee.

The mango is our Wild symbol, and thanks to its function as a wild card, it replaces all symbols except for special ones.

The Free Spins symbol gives us free spins: 15 if three symbols land, 30 with four symbols, and a whopping 60 with five symbols. During Free Spins, we can earn more.

The chimpanzee with the Bonus caption triggers the special function. The grid disappears and rows of bananas appear. We must click on some of the bananas and discover the corresponding prize. The game ends when the Collect message appears on the screen.

message.content:
Banana King

In this slot game from World Match, we find ourselves in a lush forest inhabited by friendly banana-loving chimpanzees. As always, when we're talking about this developer, we know we'll be facing a flawless slot from every point of view. Before venturing into the description of how this game works, let's spend a few words on the graphics, which have been excellently crafted.

The game grid consists of a series of intertwined branches, with the lush forest in the background. Usually, in other World Match slots, the buttons are located on the left, but this time they are at the bottom of the screen. The buttons available are Lines, Bet Level, Start, Max Bet, and Autoplay. Lower down, there are the betting statistics, winnings, and the cost of each spin and active lines.

Features of Banana King

The grid features 5 reels and 3 rows, with selectable lines in steps: we can choose to set 1, 5, 10, 15, or even 25 pay lines. As for the bet, it starts from a minimum of €0.01 per line, but it can be adjusted to our liking up to a maximum of €2. We win by matching adjacent symbols starting from the leftmost reel to the right on an active line.

Banana King offers the possibility to select between 5 and 1,000 automatic spins and to set the maximum bet (€30) with a single button press.

The RTP value is 92.81%.

Symbols and functionalities

The game's basic symbols are 10. Starting from the lowest value, we begin with those used to form a royal flush, from 9 to Ace. Next up, we have cherries, bananas, a leaf crown, and finally, the chimpanzee.

The mango is our Wild symbol, and thanks to its function as a wild card, it replaces all symbols except for special ones.

The Free Spins symbol gives us free spins: 15 if three symbols land, 30 with four symbols, and a whopping 60 with five symbols. During Free Spins, we can earn more.

The chimpanzee with the Bonus caption triggers the special function. The grid disappears and rows of bananas appear. We must click on some of the bananas and discover the corresponding prize. The game ends when the Collect message appears on the screen.

response.headline: Gameplay Features
response.content: In Banana King, players are taken to a forest inhabited by chimpanzees that love bananas. The game boasts a flawless design with graphics excellently crafted. The game grid consists of 5 reels and 3 rows, with selectable lines in steps up to 25 pay lines. We can set our bets from a minimum of €0.01 per line to a maximum of €2 and win by matching adjacent symbols from the leftmost reel to the right on an active line. Banana King offers the possibility to select between 5 and 1,000 automatic spins and to set the maximum bet (€30) with a single button press.

response.headline: Bet Limits
response.content: In Banana King, the minimum bet starts from €0.01 per line, which is ideal for beginners or those not wanting to risk much. We can adjust our bets up to a maximum of €2 to play more confidently. Players can also set the maximum bet (€30) with a single button press.

response.headline: Symbols
response.content: Banana King features 10 basic symbols, ranging from royal flush symbols 9 to Ace and cherries, bananas, a leaf crown, and a chimpanzee. The mango is the Wild symbol, which replaces all symbols except for special ones. The Free Spins symbol gives players free spins, which can be 15 with three symbols, 30 with four symbols, and a whopping 60 with five symbols. During Free Spins, players are eligible to earn more. The chimpanzee with the Bonus caption triggers the special function, where the game grid disappears and rows of bananas appear. Players are required to click on some of the bananas and discover the corresponding prize, which ends when the Collect message appears on the screen.

response.headline: Design and Theme
response.content: World Match, the developer of Banana King, has excellently crafted the graphics, presenting players with a lush forest inhabited by chimpanzees that love bananas. The game grid consists of intertwined branches, with the forest providing a perfect background theme. The buttons, which are usually located on the left in most World Match slots, are at the bottom of the screen, with betting statistics, winnings, and the cost of each spin and active lines located below them.

response.headline: RTP Value
response.content: The RTP value of Banana King is 92.81%. This means that for every €100 wagered, the game pays out an average of €92.81 over time. While this RTP is not the best, it falls within the average range compared to other slot games.

response.headline: Banana King gameplay and features
response.content: Banana King offers selectable pay lines from 1 to 25 and adjustable bets from €0.01 to €2 per line. The Wild symbol is the mango, which can replace all symbols except for special ones. The Free Spins symbol awards 15, 30, or 60 free spins, depending on how many land on the grid. The game's highest-paying symbol is the chimpanzee, which awards up to 2,500 coins.

response.headline: Banana King special bonus feature
response.content: The special bonus feature in Banana King is triggered by the chimpanzee with the Bonus caption. When it lands on the grid, the rows of bananas replace the game grid, and we need to click on some of them to reveal the corresponding prize. The game ends when the Collect message appears on the screen.

The mango is our Wild symbol, and thanks to its function as a wild card, it replaces all symbols except for special ones.

The Free Spins symbol gives us free spins: 15 if three symbols land, 30 with four symbols, and a whopping 60 with five symbols. During Free Spins, we can earn more.

The chimpanzee with the Bonus caption triggers the special function. The grid disappears and rows of bananas appear. We must click on some of the bananas and discover the corresponding prize. The game ends when the Collect message appears on the screen.

Review:
 
Gameplay Features

In Banana King, players are taken to a forest inhabited by chimpanzees that love bananas. The game boasts a flawless design with graphics excellently crafted. The game grid consists of 5 reels and 3 rows, with selectable lines in steps up to 25 pay lines. We can set our bets from a minimum of €0.01 per line to a maximum of €2 and win by matching adjacent symbols from the leftmost reel to the right on an active line. Banana King offers the possibility to select between 5 and 1,000 automatic spins and to set the maximum bet (€30) with a single button press.

Bet Limits

In Banana King, the minimum bet starts from €0.01 per line, which is ideal for beginners or those not wanting to risk much. We can adjust our bets up to a maximum of €2 to play more confidently. Players can also set the maximum bet (€30) with a single button press.

Symbols

Banana King features 10 basic symbols, ranging from royal flush symbols 9 to Ace and cherries, bananas, a leaf crown, and a chimpanzee. The mango is the Wild symbol, which replaces all symbols except for special ones. The Free Spins symbol gives players free spins, which can be 15 with three symbols, 30 with four symbols, and a whopping 60 with five symbols. During Free Spins, players are eligible to earn more. The chimpanzee with the Bonus caption triggers the special function, where the game grid disappears and rows of bananas appear. Players are required to click on some of the bananas and discover the corresponding prize, which ends when the Collect message appears on the screen.

Design and Theme

World Match, the developer of Banana King, has excellently crafted the graphics, presenting players with a lush forest inhabited by chimpanzees that love bananas. The game grid consists of intertwined branches, with the forest providing a perfect background theme. The buttons, which are usually located on the left in most World Match slots, are at the bottom of the screen, with betting statistics, winnings, and the cost of each spin and active lines located below them.

RTP Value

The RTP value of Banana King is 92.81%. This means that for every €100 wagered, the game pays out an average of €92.81 over time. While this RTP is not the best, it falls within the average range compared to other slot games.

Review: Banana King

In this slot game from World Match, we find ourselves in a lush forest inhabited by friendly banana-loving chimpanzees. As always, when we're talking about this developer, we know we'll be facing a flawless slot from every point of view. Before venturing into the description of how this game works, let's spend a few words on the graphics, which have been excellently crafted.

The game grid consists of a series of intertwined branches, with the lush forest in the background. Usually, in other World Match slots, the buttons are located on the left, but this time they are at the bottom of the screen. The buttons available are Lines, Bet Level, Start, Max Bet, and Autoplay. Lower down, there are the betting statistics, winnings, and the cost of each spin and active lines.

Features of Banana King

The grid features 5 reels and 3 rows, with selectable lines in steps: we can choose to set 1, 5, 10, 15, or even 25 pay lines. As for the bet, it starts from a minimum of €0.01 per line, but it can be adjusted to our liking up to a maximum of €2. We win by matching adjacent symbols starting from the leftmost reel to the right on an active line.

Banana King offers the possibility to select between 5 and 1,000 automatic spins and to set the maximum bet (€30) with a single button press.

The RTP value is 92.81%.

Symbols and functionalities

The game's basic symbols are 10. Starting from the lowest value, we begin with those used to form a royal flush, from 9 to Ace. Next up, we have cherries, bananas, a leaf crown, and finally, the chimpanzee.

The mango is our Wild symbol, and thanks to its function as a wild card, it replaces all symbols except for special ones.

The Free Spins symbol gives us free spins: 15 if three symbols land, 30 with four symbols, and a whopping 60 with five symbols. During Free Spins, we can earn more.

The chimpanzee with the Bonus caption triggers the special function. The grid disappears and rows of bananas appear. We must click on some of the bananas and discover the corresponding prize. The game ends when the Collect message appears on the screen.

faq.question: What is Banana King?
faq.answer: Banana King is a 5-reel online slot game from World Match that features a jungle theme and friendly chimpanzees.

faq.question: What are the buttons available in Banana King?
faq.answer: The buttons available in Banana King are Lines, Bet Level, Start, Max Bet, and Autoplay.

faq.question: How do I win in Banana King?
faq.answer: You can win in Banana King by matching adjacent symbols starting from the leftmost reel to the right on an active line.

faq.question: What is the RTP value of Banana King?
faq.answer: The RTP value of Banana King is 92.81%.

faq.question: What are the basic symbols in Banana King?
faq.answer: The basic symbols in Banana King are 9 to Ace, cherries, bananas, a leaf crown, and a chimpanzee.

faq.question: What does the Wild symbol do in Banana King?
faq.answer: The Wild symbol (mango) in Banana King replaces all symbols except special ones.

faq.question: How do I trigger the Free Spins function in Banana King?
faq.answer: You can trigger the Free Spins function in Banana King by getting 3 or more Free Spins symbols. The more symbols you get, the more free spins you receive.

faq.question: What does the Bonus symbol do in Banana King?
faq.answer: The Bonus symbol (chimpanzee) in Banana King triggers the special function where rows of bananas appear and you can earn prizes by clicking on them.
